attributes.action: Have a referendum on Britain's membership of the European Union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Suggest that Britain withdraws from
membership of the european union, and
simply has associate membership as is 
the case of Norway and Iceland.   Also
look into having and association with
the NAFTA.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
